forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning fog, then mostly cloudy this afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. A few peeks of sunshine possible. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. High 59F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 17C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 63F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
